website_summaries.verdict: This fun, easy-to-use gumball machine is also bank, and is available at a surprisingly low price point considering its durable construction.
pros: Nice price for a cast metal model with a glass globe
Works as both a gumball machine and change bank, and will take quarters, dimes, nickels, and pennies
Can also be assembled to dispense without coins
cons: Some reports of faulty machines that didn't dispense gumballs

customer_reviews.title: Old school gumball machine!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gumball machines, metal & glass - not flimsy plastic. Arrived packaged in a tight fitting box w/extra cushion. Nothing damaged. Carefully read instructions & tighten top screw as directed! Holds half a 53 oz bag of Dubble Bubble gumballs.
customer_reviews.author: Shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: It's very cute and I think my students will love it. I filled it with erasers
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and I think my students will love it. I filled it with erasers. I decided to spray paint it to go with the colors in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: My glass globe didn't break.....here's why....
customer_reviews.text: Ok, after reading so reviews about this gum ball machine's glass globe breaking, I was leery to purchase. But after examining how it's built, I decided to buy. Here's why. To refill the machine, you have to loosen the screw on top to remove the hat. After refilling the globe and replacing the hat, you have tighten the screw....DO NOT OVER-TIGHTEN! Or you will put too much pressure on glass causing it to break. I can almost guarantee this is what happened to the other unfortunate folks out there. Just snug the screw down and it should last for years to come....
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment! Sturdy and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Gumball machine. I am using it currently for Jelly Belly Jelly Beans and it works great! It provides about 5 jelly beans per crank as it was delivered. I know I can adjust this, but its perfect. Definitely worth the price. Sturdy metal and glass. I don't care for the plastic cover over the hole and my "customers" have complained about this. I am having issues trying to get it off, so will just leave it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Tessen

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2. Neither worked.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Never worked. Tried with candy corn. Tried with Twizzlers nibs. Doesn’t go more than 3 turns before it jams. I BOUGHT A SECOND! thought it was a fluke the first time. Nope, just a bad machine. Oh yeah, NO RETURNS... go ahead, do just like me and buy anyway. Good luck. Dear manufacturer, would be nice if you responded to ANY of these negative reviews. HAPPY SHOPPING!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: So awesome and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice and sturdy machine. We didn't want our son to have gumballs in it and instead are using m&ms and cadbury mini eggs and they fit perfectly. I also love that it can be used as a bank feature so it requires actual money. That setting can be changed but we are leaving it set to the bank. It's made out of actual metal and glass and isn't a flimsy plastic machine.
customer_reviews.author: Steph K

customer_reviews.title: Add to Cart Already! Perfect for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: What kid wouldn't love a gum all machine at their house? We have one with skittles and runts mixed in it and our bunch loves earning money for candy. We also gave one to my sons Kindergarten teacher as they have some reward system and already had skittles as the reward. It's of course a huge hit there as well! I could see so many types of candy that could go in this. I actually didn't read that it didn't come with bubble gum but that was ok as we planned on having different stuff in ours. Could be great for adults as well! Put your favorite gum or breath mints in it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my sons first birthday circus party. I’ll figure out something to use them for in the future cause they are super cute. We filled one with m&ms and one with peanut m&ms.
customer_reviews.author: Anni Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great little dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Great little gumball machine, considering the price. The sellers were great as well in their attention to detail and responsiveness. This machine handles balls up to o.625"(5/8). The tray the goodies lands in is adjustable such that it can handle larger balls, like the .80" balls we use, but to accommodate this I had to do some adjustments most people can't do as well, such as filing the interior and trimming springs, so I recommend you use their 5/8" ball size as a maximum. I also removed the interior spring that required a coin to turn the crank...easy for me, but perhaps not for everyone. It's possible that they may be willing to do this, but I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Charming
customer_reviews.text: I struggled between sizes, but eventually chose this 12" one. It is made of glass, very high quality and actually requires quarters! You can disable that feature but you have to take it apart. I've set a mug next to it to get an idea of size in the picture attached. It holds nearly 3 pounds of gumballs. I've had other gumball machines but they were plastic. This is very high quality and look how adorbs it is.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Unity Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: A great gumball dispenser. My fiance and I are using this in our ceremony instead of a unity candle. The base is made of metal, and the globe is glass. This dispenser is made very well and should last many, many years. We are going to spray paint ours bright yellow and the machine is very easy to take apart so this will be perfect. Other things to note, the money mechanism works smoothly, and the instructions contain directions for negating the need for coins to dispense candy/gum. There are also instructions on how to make it dispense more than one candy at a time, or for setting it to dispense smaller candies.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kiczula

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and poor service.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this gumball machine to use as an m&ms dispenser. Within a very short period of time the internal mechanism, that rotates and dispenses the candy, broke. I contacted the company, but because I waited until after a 90-day period, they were unwilling to do do anything for us. Poor quality and poor service. Will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This machine is as authentic as it can be. Go with the metal model never the plastic. For an eightieth birthday celebration for one of my old gang from NYC, we were asked for our favorite penny candy from our youth. (Yes, we had penny candy, nickel cokes and a candy store/hangout in every neighborhood). I ordered nine different candies still manufactured as well as dubble bubble gum balls and this machine. What a hit! The machine can easily be set to turn freely or take coins up to “two bits” if you want to use it as a fun fund raiser.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McAward

customer_reviews.title: bubble at bottom is hard to maneuver with big fingers
customer_reviews.text: It's great but the little bubble at the bottom is difficult to work with. But it can easily be removed next time I refill. All the parts are easy to remove and clean. The task of removing the change requirement was quick and easy. The glass globe doesn't seem too flimsy. I filled this with 3/8in atomic fireballs and I have the dispenser set to the smallest hole for release. I get about 2-4 balls with every spin. They are small (a little bigger than a plain m&m) so it's not a problem to get that many at once. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFriends

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be returned
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Tried multiple time, it does take the money put gum doesn’t come out. I tried to get a replacement but I can’t because this item it not aligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: cvcriola05

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good old fashion fun 😊
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Such a classic and nostalgic model of gum ball machine!! So used to everything you buy these days made so cheaply- but this is Sturdy, real glass, AND works/funtions great!! Can hold various things too - gum balls, bouncy balls, m&ms etc. Takes real coins (any size) or you can set it to not need any coins. There was some initial assembly but easy to put together. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kam17

customer_reviews.title: Just like mine as a kid!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a birthday gift for a young teen. Shipping was fast and product came in mint condition. I included a 3 lb bag of gumballs as the bank itself does not come with gum. Very satisfied with my purchase. **Update** Gift was well received and immediately opened and put together. Bank works as expected and looks very nice. Bright red metal adorns the all glass bulb holding the colorful gumballs. Bank takes real coins to disperse gum allowing the owner to make a little extra dough off family and friends. Fun for kids and adults of all ages!
customer_reviews.author: LM271891

customer_reviews.title: Chore rewards just got cool again
customer_reviews.text: My son is always bugging me at the grocery store to get a gumball. Having had multiple times where we put in 25cents and we got nothing I decided to take matters into my own hands and get my own gumball machine. This arrived and I was able to easily to fill it up with someI did not use the whole bag. Chore rewards now just became cool. My kids love that they can use the gumball machine after they have done a chore. The machine takes a variety of coins which makes it easy for me to find a coin to use it. Overall this has been a great success.
customer_reviews.author: E.S

customer_reviews.title: Classic table top gum ball machine
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my 13yo at Christmas and he loves it. We’ve used it for gum balls and Skittles. Works great. Haven’t tried the “dispense for free” option. Would prob break easy if we let him handle it freely but he’s under strict instructions to ask for help. Filling isn’t hard but getting the lid back on centered with the rubber gauge in place is sometimes a task. still a nice novelty gift and a good way to limit candy consumption by only giving him a few pennies each day for his sugary treat. Only accommodates 1/2” gum balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Don

customer_reviews.title: The real deal Gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this gumball machine because it is made of die-cast metal and very durable. It"s not only a nice gumball machine that carries and showcase my gum but its a very nice bank that holds nickels, dimes, and pennies. So, that's pretty cool! I didn't want a plastic gumball machine I wanted one that looks like the ones in the local stores but half the price and with this gumball machine, I got exactly what I was looking for. I would definitely recommend this product because it really is a nice gumball machine and also it is aesthetically pleasing to look at!!
customer_reviews.author: Berriepie

customer_reviews.title: Holds gum, dispenses when you add coins! my kids love it,
customer_reviews.text: kids love gum. dad likes showing them how to save money. this gumball machine does it all. there needs to be a screw or key or a better way to open the bottom where the coins are because my kids figured out how to retrieve the coins and reuse the same coins to get more gum!. It is made of decent materials and the instructions were good. the globe is glass so be careful with little kids (especially when they find the door in the bottom and start recycling the coins!)
customer_reviews.author: Jay Deluxe

customer_reviews.title: Great for rationing candy
customer_reviews.text: Got this to cut down on candy consumption. With so many family members in close vicinity my daughter was getting candy every day. Now they've been instructed coins only no candy. Then she can get the candy from the machine when we get home. Them money goes to her piggy bank. We put skittles, starburst minis, and jelly beans. One coins let's about 4 or 5 through. It takes any coins, pennies, nickels, dimes, and quarters. Only con - wish I could lock the top to prevent thievery.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Great that it can require money, or not
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old grandson loves it. I like that I can set it for using money (or not if I wanted) - it teaches him to earn money to pay for things he wants. It is heavy and sturdy. I discourage him from picking it up because the glass could break if dropped, so it sets on a low shelf in the kitchen where he can easily access it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My five-year-old great neice loves to play with my antique gumball machines
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old great neice loves to play with my antique gumball machines, so for Christmas, I gifted her her very own machine. When she took it out of the box, I had already filled it with gumballs, and she was begging for money to use it immediately. The bank is sturdy and easy to load in treats. I am considering purchasing one for my classroom next.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old son who wanted a gumball machine. It is real glass and real metal! Very durable-Even with 4 kids daily use! We even had it at several family events where kids aged 2-14 used it and everyone enjoyed it. You will not be disappointed if you choose to buy this. It uses coins from pennies up to quarters. We have used them all and haven't had a single issue. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: geotraxmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love
customer_reviews.text: It is as it says. It’s a little under 12 inches , I measured it’s and it’s like 11 and a half. But overall I’m like infatuated by this machine. It does take all coins and it is not lockable . So anyone who has a flat head screwdriver can access the candy and then the bottom has a standard piggy bank cover to get the money out. It’s very sturdy as far as the metal and I didn’t break the glass because I didn’t tighten the top to much.
customer_reviews.author: A'Reyanna

customer_reviews.title: Well made, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Its wonderfully nostalgic! It has a real glass globe and metal base. We chose to fill it up with Skittles but any any small-ish candy will work. My only wish is that the output opening for the candy was bigger, it can be annoying trying to get the candy out of the little opening.
customer_reviews.author: Sarie

customer_reviews.title: super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son, it is actually quite Durable except for the glass where the gumballs to go and that is very thin and they do you say to be very gentle with it so that’s the only scary part. we actually use it as one of his little baking tools so he does have to put a coin in to go to get the gum ball but it is super cute and kind of like a novelty piece in his gaming room. Also you can set it to not require a coin for gum also.
customer_reviews.author: Mya Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Takes your money but does not deliver a gumball!!!
customer_reviews.text: This gumball machine is wonderfully nostalgic. But it stopped working after 2 months. The gumball machine takes the money, but does not deliver a gumball. I don't have any mechanical savvy to try and figure out what the problem is!!! My 3 year old grandson wanted this for Christmas. He is now disappointed that he can not get a gumball after inserting his pennies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Works great to ration out the candy (except for dad who ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great to ration out the candy (except for dad who unscrews the top and pours the contents out). Works with any coin (or I am assuming any flat metal object) to unlock the twist control and dispense a few pieces of candy into the chute.
customer_reviews.author: AudioLabRat

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy to use (for 2 year old)
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my 2 year old. As she does chores, she gets a quarter which she runs to get candy. I fill it up with m&m at the tightest setting so it only releases about 5 m&m at a time (which is perfect). Was worried about it being glass with a toddler around...but realized, my toddler values her candy so much that she treats it with the most love.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this gum ball machine! It’s heavy and looks great. Easy to find gum balls to fill it either on Amazon or Target. It comes set to accept any coin and we just left it that way. We didn’t tighten the top very much since we didn’t want to break the glass like other reviews said. We have had it for a while and it’s still a house favorite. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Mobile and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, and it's also portable. Unlike a larger verson of this machine. You can bring it with you. Useful to make some money in your office or arcade. However; this product doesn't have any braille on it, but it does have a design of raised dots and patterns of some sort. Added gumballs inside, and it's readyto use. Like that metal design, and it's a great product to recommend to not just kids... also adults!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: If filling with jelly beans read this !!!
customer_reviews.text: I filled this little dispenser up with jelly beans instead of gum balls as my daughter can’t have chewing gum. The dispenser works OK for jelly beans but probably performs better with gum balls. I’ve had to disassemble the unit twice to retrieve a lodged jelly bean. Overall I would highly recommend this product for anyone wanting a solid candy dispenser. I would suggest using gum exclusively or being prepared to disassemble it .......
customer_reviews.author: Roger E

customer_reviews.title: The glass is very thin and very easy to break but I just loaded the gumboils myself ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass is very thin and very easy to break but I just loaded the gumboils myself and put it on a shelf. So far we've had little ones get their own gumballs and it hasn't broken. I would't recommend it for smaller children and I would definitely put it somewhere safer. But I do love that it looks like a real gumball machine and the machine itself is made of medal.
customer_reviews.author: Dre M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Little thing! My daughter loves it, goes in it multiple times a day because she doesnt always have coins to put in it (you can't get gum unless you put in a quarter) and it hasn't broken yet, so I'd say it's very durable! We've had another one before this and the glass shattered within days, so definitely get this one if little ones will be using it!
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable! Great for chore rewards!
customer_reviews.text: My little ones love this! They earn a penny for various tasks and then they go get their candy. You can set it to take any coin and you can set how much can’t it gives out.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Our kid loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Our kid asked for a gumball machine from Santa last year. I didn't see any gumball machines on Amazon which had stellar reviews, so I went with this one. She is very happy with it, and we have no issues. It looks good and the coin mechanism works well. The gumballs come out as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue 99

customer_reviews.title: My son loves gum
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a reward for my son who loves gum. It's just like the one I remember having when I was a kid. It's very sturdy. I was able to find gum balls on Amazon too. It's also a bank which is nice because he likes to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Nahoo

customer_reviews.title: suprised how original it looks
customer_reviews.text: pleasantly suprised on this purchase was going to go with a plastic one since my daughter was 5 when we bought it but this has withstand the test of time we haven't ever dropped it so i cant vouch for it on that end. she loved it just remember your going to need gumballs on the smaller side not the ones in the big machines. I find both sizes at the dollar store better quality than the gumballs on amazon
customer_reviews.author: jasmine g

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product as a strategy to save money as we eat less candy. lol! It worked! My young adult kids look for quarters through out the house to buy candy. They are a mess! They love candy, this was a way to reduce their candy intake while forcing them to produce effort to eat it. It is an awesome product. I wish I had it when my kids were younger. lol!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but be aware that the top is glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to replace a plastic one that they broke. It is really good quality, body is all metal but the top is glass. More of a decorative piece than something for the kids to play with because of the glass top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids or home. Uses ALL coins only!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Its very well built, and perfect size for placing on a desk or counter. Cons: I will not let you set it to quarters only. Its more of a bank in a way.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of the gum all machine is plastic and when we were trying to get the machine to accept money in return for a gumball the glass glove broke! No returns for this gift so buyer beware....i’m not certain the machine ever worked and now I have to buy a new globe🙄. So much for this christmas gift .
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: A pretty machine that looks great in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built gumball machine. Changing the settings to allow gumball dispensing without having to add change can be a little tricky. But it works well - with our without the coin requirements turned on. A pretty machine that looks great in our kitchen. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is due to the trickiness to change the coin requirements. But the machine itself is beautiful and sturdy. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Gwd_JS

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this for my son who is fascinated by gumball machines and vending machines. Now he is frantically looking for coins throughout the house to get more peanut M&Ms, lol. With the default setup, 1 peanut M&M comes out per coin, which is perfect for portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase. Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your $$. Only worked 2 times. Garbage. My students are so upset and so am I. Tried to return and it can’t be. So I am stuck with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: a little difficult to get working without money
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter wanted this in the worst way for Christmas and I spent two hours figuring out how to get the knob to turn without putting money in it. My self and my older grand daughter would read the directions to each other and try to make it work we did finally succeed and my youngest grand daughter is happy with it it is glass. and other wise appears sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made well and just what we where looking for
customer_reviews.text: Best gumball machine it's perfect just as described. I saw some reviews about the glass breaking I think that's probably because they screwed the top too tight. It shipped to you very very sturdy a foam molded holder is around it in the Box. We have had it now for a while and I've never had any trouble with the glass top at all. It works really well and was just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to return not noted in description of the item
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. We have an issue and want to return the item and it is marked as not returnable even with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at, but not functional
customer_reviews.text: The gumball machine jammed within the first week. It's cute if you just want something to look at, but if you actually want to use it, I wouldn't recommend it. The only reason I didn't return it was that I was gone or hosting family until well a few weeks after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: SandFam

customer_reviews.title: Old Time Feel to a Gift For Kids
customer_reviews.text: My nephews love this! They had a candy dish on their counter, but this is so much more fun to them. Now the dish holds pennies to use in this device. Has held up well for a few years now and does not jam. Easy to fill with new gumballs. Easy to remove the coins. Great gift - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, just as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just as described. Super cute and really good quality. I got it for the office, it sits on my desk. People comment on it often. I like that it can be converted to not need coins, but will still take them if you want even after converting. The directions are clear on how to do that and its super easy to do. It works great and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little gumball machine for the price, my 5 yo son absolutely loves it, can put M&M's inside it or any pieces of candy less than < .5 inches (1/2 inch) It is great product at a great price. Comparable products were twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: David Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas. It was exactly what she expected. It looks just like the ones you find at the store near the purchase counters. Love the coin and no coin option! The quality is great, globe is glass. We used it with smaller gym balls but I believe you can use bigger size ones. We wanted to get her a "real" gumball machine that looks old school and metal red. Not plastic. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Claudia P.

customer_reviews.title: The size of the bubblegum needs to be exact
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bubble gum really matters. Bought 3 different bags and none of the worked. No bubblegum comes with this purchase. Order the bag of gum that Amazon bundles. I do not recall seeing a bundle when I purchased mine. Other than, it made a perfect gift for my niece. When she got the right size gum, she was excited! Glad I bought her 2 bags.
customer_reviews.author: John Miguel

customer_reviews.title: FREE SPIN DOES NOT WORK!  CAN'T RETURN!
customer_reviews.text: UGH. This item is NOT as described. I have been trying to change it to free spin for days now, have watched you tube videos and searched the questions area. I also contacted the seller and never received a response. There is no option for me to return it either and it has been sitting on my desk at work in pieces for days now since I took it apart and have tried to set it to free spin.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Desai

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Cute gumball machine but it doesn’t work 80% of the time. My son wanted this for his birthday. It worked the first day or two but after that it quit dispensing gumballs. It’s a good quality material- metal and glass top, which is what I was looking for. But the rest of it seems cheap. Unfortunately I can’t return it now as I missed the window but I’m super disappointed and so is my son.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  come  with the  gum
customer_reviews.text: I like the counter top size, its clear glass not scratching up and working great. It's our fun reward at home daycare for most helpful kids! Takes any coin. I wish gum came with the machine! We had to get dollar store gum.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality gum ball machine! After spending money on plastic ones that kept breaking, I decided glass was the way to go. This one won't disappoint. Works with real money and it's easy to get it back out when you want to. Now if only organic gum balls were easy to find...
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: It broke right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I ordered this for my son for Christmas. I thought it would be such a neat and original gift. When we took it out of the box and started filling it with gumballs, the glass broke. I was heartbroken. It didn't last 10 minutes out of the box. Save your money. I probably can't return it because I think it's from a third-party seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful gumball bank, but definitely not suitable for children. My 4yo son cracked the globe within two days, putting gumballs in (the globe was upside down, of course). We haven't allowed him to use it since. Definitely disappointed, because we were hoping this would be at least somewhat durable, but apparently it's not good for much more than show. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Leya

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone who love jawbreakers. They absolutely loved it. I bought the 5 lb. bag of jawbreakers and filled it up before giving it. The machine holds up to 2 lbs of jawbreakers. The machine is very nice and will hold candy up to a 1 in ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable small gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gumball machine bank. I use it as a reward for my kids and they love it. Only thing is it does get stuck while turning so I’d have an adult dispense the gum. Great metal and glass product it just seems the turn knob is a little wonky.
customer_reviews.author: alexis searcy

customer_reviews.title: Great for tic tacs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lame it doesnt come ready to dispense gumballs. We filled it with gumballs. Regular sized. They wont dispense. Great product. A gumball machine that doesnt dispense gumballs.
customer_reviews.author: CurbsideLife

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, shipped fast, packed well.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. Bought for a 7 year old girl for xmas and she LOVES it. "Best gift ever!" said she. It was shipped fast, packed well and comes in its own box which was perfect for wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just like the classic gumball machines. Easy to assemble. Hold a lot of gumballs. The globe is real glass so be careful, mine arrived broken and i had to get a replacement and thank goodness for amazon because the seller didnt want to help.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Medium Gumball Bank, 12
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really enjoyed her Gumball Machine and she has had a great time with it , in fact every time some one comes into the house she gives them a gumball before they leave. I like the durability of the material that they machine is made out of and it's something that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Lester L Morrison is my profile name and I do not have a picture to show

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, fun present
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. It is metal and glass and not plastic like a lot of others that are for sale. The mechanism where you insert the coin is very sturdy. I would say to be very careful and I'm not sure I would buy this for young children. I got it for a 6 year old and the glass was broke within a week. It was completely our fault, Bc our little one was too rough, but that is why I recommend it for older kids. It holds a lot of gumballs and it worked great! It's a fun present!
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: High quality, and replacable parts avail...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 yr olds bday. He LOVES it. We adjusted it so skittles would work. Now all the kids and friends gives him money. Haha. From teaching how to save, to making money.
customer_reviews.author: TwiggyB

customer_reviews.title: Fun gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this gumball machine. It is helping them do stuff to earn coins to get gum. You can set it for free or for coins. Very cute machine and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedchick

customer_reviews.title: thin glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass is super thin ... the first bag of gumballs i put in slow and steady and still one of the gumballs hit the glass and popped a small hole right in the side of it... it didn't shatter... just punched a dime sized hole in the side of the glass... now I can't use it for it's intended purpose... out of fear that the glass might chip and my 3 yr old daughter would end up chewing on some glass with her gumballs... now it's just decoration
customer_reviews.author: Leland C. Neadle III

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and not returnable! Watch out.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The gumballs made it top heavy, it fell over and the birthday party was covered in glass. Such a waste of money and I had a heartbroken little birthday boy. Replacement bulb is the price of the whole gumball machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and does not break easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas last year. He still has it and absolutely loves it! I thought several times that it would be broken because it is Glass and Metal however, it is great quality and thick glass and has held up tremendously with my autistic son.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A.

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after reading so many good reviews but it was slightly disappointing. The make and look is absolutely beautiful. Assembling was easy too. But it stops working frequently and we have to reassemble it every time.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Gumball machine for the office or any room to share with others
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gumball machine. I filled it with a 2 lb bag of gumballs and found that it filled the glass globe 3/4. It will need another pound or more to fill it all the way to the top. The top was easy to open with a coin and closed without a problem. Definitely need to avoid tightening screw too much so the glass won't crack. This is a great product for an office desk or end table for everyone to enjoy. Brings back childhood memories of simpler times.
customer_reviews.author: insomniac6158

customer_reviews.title: Great gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: This product was given as a gift. My daughter gave it to a little boy that she babysits. He loves it and was so happy to receive this gift. The quality is great and it is easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: MD1011

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken cannot return.
customer_reviews.text: The glass was broken when I got it.. based on the policy I could not return it. Threw it in trash.. how could the delivery guy not hear the rattling of broken glass?? Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jeebers29

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but coins get stuck often
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVED getting this gumball machine as a gift. I wanted to love it, but her constant yelling "mom! It's clogged!" gets really old. The coins get stuck and it has to be taken apart to release the stuck coin. Not the best design.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I git this for my grandson. It's a little fragile for little tykes. Looks great and works well. If your going to gift it don't forget the gum balls, skittles etc..........
customer_reviews.author: charles e scholtes

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to adjust and isn't reliable in dispensing
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, however, it's very hard to adjust the amount you want dispensed. Then once you get it set it works for a while, then it doesn't dispense anything, almost like its jammed but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worth What You Pay
customer_reviews.text: This gumball machine is very well made for the types of products available in the market today. I like the fact that the body/base of it is all metal instead of a cheap plastic. I don't understand these reviews claiming that the glass globe is so fragile. It is a good medium thick glass. I accidentally knocked the globe against a wooden table and it didn't break. I knocked it pretty hard, too. So I wouldn't be concerned about the glass being too fragile unless you or your kids plan on drop kicking it just for fun. Overall I would say it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday. It holds two large bags of m&ms and could probably hold a third. She loves it. It's easy to use, but the directions are very vague, and the illustrations are terrible. I was relieved that I put it back together again!
customer_reviews.author: momto3

customer_reviews.title: Classic Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 7 year old. It has a glass globe that is pretty sturdy, also doubles as a bank. My son says the coins have to be face out when inserting into machine. Have not had any issues. Definitely satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes B.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous thin glass and marginal coin operation
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled to find this attractive machine. Looks and feel great. My daughter was so excited to get this. We thought we hit a home run with the selection. Unfortunately the coin mechanism jambs regularly. More serious is the thin glass. The writing was on the wall when neighborhood children grab at the machine. The first tip on the counter and the glass broke leaving one cut finger and a crying child. If the style remained the same, the base remained the same, the mechanism get tweaked and the globe be made of a strong plastic or better glass, this would be a so nice. Unfortunately I can not even find the manufacturer to help get this fixed
customer_reviews.author: marc h.

customer_reviews.title: Jammed on first day
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a decently made gumball machine, I was wrong! The machine jammed on the 5th time we used it. I know have a very sad little girl who really wanted this for Christmas. I'll buy something nicer next time!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Cap to hold money is is plastic and breaks very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this gumball machine. However, the bottom lock to keep the money from falling out broke the day after he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This item cannot be returned, so make absolutely sure that you want it before orderig. There is nothing wrong with the product, but I'm giving it a one-star rating because it cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Gumball Lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my son's 4th birthday and it was so cool that I had to buy one for my nephew's birthday. Really niece machine. My only observation which I will point out is that it doesn't take dimes, so when your little one tries to twist a dime, the machine will spit it out where it spits out the gumballs. My problem with that is that the money is not clean and then your little one eats a gumball from that but it's not a horrible thing because it's easily preventable.
customer_reviews.author: Fyzzy Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Glass globe and metal base it’s good quality, my newphew is 9 and he was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bc I wasn’t paying attention to my shipping address and they are not refundable. Glass globe and metal base it’s good quality, my newphew is 9 and he was thrilled with it. I found the gumballs at Walmart for half the price of what they are sold here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect machine for my 3 year old. She has to earn quarters to use it. I filled it with m&m but because it's summer, I keep it in the fridge. I was surprised at the sturdiness, it's great quality.
customer_reviews.author: P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for a fun machine. Filled ours with M&Ms. Seems to be made very well. Kids enjoy putting their coins in it too. Decorative. Reminds me of one I had when I was little.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Glover

customer_reviews.title: Super Old Fashioned Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: Super old fashioned Gumball Bank! A total hit with the grandkids. I might have to put some money in too and get a gumball. Very well made and a fair price. It was packaged well with the glass intact. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this is the small dispenser tray and cheap plastic cover it broke after one day with the kids
customer_reviews.author: Richard Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Office
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law loves this thing. He has an office job and likes to keep it on his desk for the people who come in. Sometimes they ask him "is this for real?" and he says "yep, sure is! Drop a penny in and have a snack". He leaves a tray of pennies right next to it so it's a great ice breaker and conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Your Forte Products

customer_reviews.title: Authentic gum ball machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, classic gumball machine. The metal and glass contruction feels authentic, even though there is a plastic piece housing the bank on the bottom. It hasn't given any trouble will gumballs not coming out, etc. We are happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: DonaghySC

customer_reviews.title: Works for potty training
customer_reviews.text: Got this to “encourage” my two year old twins to use the potty. I had to change the dispense amount which was rather easy to do. I than filled it with m&m’s. Really cute to have! Glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: H H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a great price. This was purchased as a birthday gift and is well loved. I would watch out for the glass area, as it sometimes disconnects with the rubber seal. Overall there has not been any difficulty with feeding the coins into it or having the gumballs come out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Angoco

customer_reviews.title: Decent gumball machine. If your having trouble getting the coin mechanism out read here!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long the coin mechanism will last under repeated use but it's a decent gumball machine. If your having issues removing the coin mechanism to turn it to free play keep reading on. You must remove the screw on the gray base. Once the gray base comes off. There is a small screw that must be loosened on the right side of the coin mechanism before the coin mechanism slides out.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Storer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite machine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. Had one for my boys growing up, and now my grandsons have one too! Great quality, heavy duty, glass globe, and easy to fill. M&Ms in it now, and bubblegum balls are waiting in the wings. I may actually purchase a second machine so they can have both!
customer_reviews.author: MamaLing

product_meta.title: Medium Gumball Bank, 12"
product_meta.description:
The original Junior Carousel Gumball Machine is a smaller version of the classic gumball machine that set the standard for bubble gum machines when they were first introduced in the 1920's - almost 90 years ago. This brand new replica antique gumball machine is guaranteed authentic made by Carousel/Ford Gum Machine. Don’t settle for cheap imitations!

At 11.5” tall, this old fashioned gumball machine is perfect for home, office or dorm room use. It’s also a great gumball machine for kids because it works as a gumball machine bank that helps teach how to save money. Kids of all ages love to put a coin in and guess which color they’ll get!

Junior Carousel Gumball Machine Features: 
- Real glass gumball machine globe
- Cast metal gumball machine base, lid, and coin mechanism
- Accepts any coins (quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies)
- Includes instructions for "free spin” to work without coins
- Works as a gumball bank - retrieve coins when full
- Anti-spill gumball chute door cover
- Machine comes fully assembled in a gift box
- Dispenses small gumballs (.62" or smaller), candy, or nuts
- Gumball capacity: 2 lbs. of .62" gumballs
- Dimensions: 12"H x 8”W
- Weight: 5 lbs.
- Color: Classic red finish
- 30-day money back guaranteeAvailability: Plenty in stock! Your order will ship the same day if its placed before 12:00pm Mountain Time Mon-Fri. Otherwise your order will ship on the next business day.

Great gift idea! This is a great gumball machine for kids - it works as a bank that rewards them with a gumball every time they put a coin into their savings. The smaller photo above shows the Junior Carousel’s colorful gift box (shipped in a plain outer box).
feature_bullets: Carousel door; easy lift top keeps gumballs off the floor
Flexible dispensing; accepts pennies, nickles, dimes and quarters or, set it for plain dispensing
